articles.title: Antarctica bombshell: 'Abandoned' World War 2 base used during secret Nazi operation - Daily Express
articles.description: AN ANTARCTICA research base, established by British soldiers during a secret mission to protect against Nazi Germany, still holds an incredible insight into the past.
